languages.text: {n}Погруженный в воспоминания, Гордей не замечает вашего жеста. Он смотрит на буклет в руках с какой-то невыразимой нежностью и тоской.{/n}
{n}Absorbed in reminiscing, Gordei doesn't notice your gesture. He is looking at the booklet in his hands with indescribable tenderness and longing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Погруженный в воспоминания, Гордей не замечает вашего жеста. Он смотрит на буклет в руках с какой-то невыразимой нежностью и тоской.{/n}

languages.text: {n}思い出に浸っているゴルデイはこちらがあくびをしたことに気づいていない。彼は手元の小冊子を、優しさと憧れの要り混じった説明しがたい目で見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Absorbed in reminiscing, Gordei doesn't notice your gesture. He is looking at the booklet in his hands with indescribable tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思い出に浸っているゴルデイはこちらがあくびをしたことに気づいていない。彼は手元の小冊子を、優しさと憧れの要り混じった説明しがたい目で見つめている。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}戈尔代沉浸在回忆中，并没有注意到你的手势。他盯着手中的小册子，眼里带着难以言喻的温柔与渴切。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Absorbed in reminiscing, Gordei doesn't notice your gesture. He is looking at the booklet in his hands with indescribable tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}戈尔代沉浸在回忆中，并没有注意到你的手势。他盯着手中的小册子，眼里带着难以言喻的温柔与渴切。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Gordei, absorto en sus recuerdos, no se percata de tu gesto. Está mirando el libreto que tiene entre las manos con una ternura y una añoranza indescriptibles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Absorbed in reminiscing, Gordei doesn't notice your gesture. He is looking at the booklet in his hands with indescribable tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei, absorto en sus recuerdos, no se percata de tu gesto. Está mirando el libreto que tiene entre las manos con una ternura y una añoranza indescriptibles.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Absorbé par ses souvenirs, Gordei ne remarque pas votre réaction. Il regarde l'opuscule entre ses mains avec une nostalgie empreinte de tendresse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Absorbed in reminiscing, Gordei doesn't notice your gesture. He is looking at the booklet in his hands with indescribable tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Absorbé par ses souvenirs, Gordei ne remarque pas votre réaction. Il regarde l'opuscule entre ses mains avec une nostalgie empreinte de tendresse.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}In seiner Erinnerung versunken, bemerkt Gordei deine Geste nicht. Er betrachtet das Büchlein in seinen Händen mit unbeschreiblicher Zärtlichkeit und ebensolchem Verlangen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Absorbed in reminiscing, Gordei doesn't notice your gesture. He is looking at the booklet in his hands with indescribable tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Kendini eski günlere kaptıran Gordei, hareketini fark etmiyor bile. Ellerinde tuttuğu kitapçığa tarifi imkânsız bir şefkat ve özlemle bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Absorbed in reminiscing, Gordei doesn't notice your gesture. He is looking at the booklet in his hands with indescribable tenderness and longing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kendini eski günlere kaptıran Gordei, hareketini fark etmiyor. Ellerinde tuttuğu kitapçığa tarifi imkânsız bir özlem ve duygusallıkla bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian
